name: asymptix/html-dom-parser
description: Composer adaptation and wrapper for the Simple HTML DOM parser written on PHP5+ let you manipulate HTML in a very easy and fast way. It supports invalid HTML DOM and may find tags in HTML DOM with selectors just like jQuery.

authors.name: Dmytro Zarezenko
authors.role: Parser wrapper and Composer adaptation development

authors.name: Simple HTML DOM team: S.C. Chen <me578022@gmail.com>, John Schlick, Rus Carroll
